strings: <voice_0x01000EBE><se_def>Prince Charmles: That stinky old wagon is far too small for me!
<voice_0x01000EBF><se_def>Prince Charmles: Maybe I could stretch my legs if you got rid of that worthless pot.
<voice_0x01000EC0><se_def>Prince Charmles: Good grief! What's THAT? What kind of people are you, travelling with a freak like that?
<voice_0x01000EC1><se_low>Yangus: Here, Grandad! You'd o' bitten my 'ead off if I'd o' said somefin' like that! ‘I'm a king, you half<->witted twerp!’
<voice_0x01000EC3><se_low>King Trode: Look at us! Don't you see? We can't tell him his fiancée has turned into a horse!
<voice_0x01000EC4><se_low>King Trode: Much better to keep the truth a secret for now. Make sure everyone knows to keep it under their hats.
<voice_0x01000EC5><se_low>King Trode: Prince Charmless! What is our destination?
<voice_0x01000EC6><se_def>Prince Charmles: It's ‘Charmles’, you clot! Just head east. Eventually we'll come to the royal hunting ground. That's where the initiations take place.
<voice_0x01000EC7><se_def>Prince Charmles: Oh! And before I forget, <hero>...
<voice_0x01000EC8><se_def>Prince Charmles: This phial contains a powder that masks human scent. You must sprinkle it on yourselves before we enter the royal hunting ground.

<voice_0x01000EC9><se_def>Prince Charmles: Argon lizards are very sensitive to smell.
If they get wind of our unmasked scent,
they'll run away.
<voice_0x01000ECA><se_def>Prince Charmles: In other words, we've got to smell like lizards to fight lizards!
<voice_0x01000ECB><se_def>Prince Charmles: I'm supposed to be doing this by myself, so I shall be staying in the wagon until we arrive.

<voice_0x01000ECC><se_def>Prince Charmles: I'll alight upon arrival, and we shall then proceed on foot. Now get a move on,
you lazy rascals!
